mapper.select: select id, electricity_cabinet_id, product_key, device_name, tenant_id, server_begin_time, server_end_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_electricity_cabinet_server where id = #{id} and del_flag = 0

select id, electricity_cabinet_id, product_key, device_name, tenant_id, server_begin_time, server_end_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_electricity_cabinet_server limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_electricity_cabinet_server(electricity_cabinet_id, product_key, device_name, tenant_id, server_begin_time, server_end_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time) values (#{electricityCabinetId}, #{productKey}, #{deviceName}, #{tenantId}, #{serverBeginTime}, #{serverEndTime}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet_server
electricity_cabinet_id = #{electricityCabinetId},
product_key = #{productKey},
device_name = #{deviceName},
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
server_begin_time = #{serverBeginTime},
server_end_time = #{serverEndTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_electricity_cabinet_server ecs left join t_electricity_cabinet ec on ecs.electricity_cabinet_id = ec.id left join t_tenant t on ecs.tenant_id = t.id
ecs.del_flag = 0
and ec.name like concat('%', #{eleName}, '%')
and ec.device_name like concat('%', #{deviceName}, '%')
and t.name like concat('%', #{tenantName}, '%')
and ecs.server_begin_time > #{serverTimeStart}
and ecs.server_end_time < #{serverTimeEnd}

select id, electricity_cabinet_id, product_key, device_name, tenant_id, server_begin_time, server_end_time, del_flag, create_time, update_time from t_electricity_cabinet_server where del_flag = 0 and product_key = #{productKey} and device_name = #{deviceName}
